name: Gobblet | Chickens vs Ducks
description: Chickens vs Ducks is an online/offline PvP Gobblet game inspired by "Tic-Tac-Toe"  (X and O) with the ability to kick out a smaller character and replace it with a bigger one, making the game deeper, more challenging, and more fun! The game is played on a 4×4 board. Each player has 16 characters of the same species but different sizes.
